alert.note: Alert for Custer (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 18 at 7:09PM MDT until June 26 at 3:39PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Pocatello ID has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Idaho... Big Lost River below Mackay Reservoir affecting Custer County. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/pocatello. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR A DAM FLOODGATE RELEASE IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO MONDAY, JUNE 26... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Big Lost River below Mackay Reservoir. * WHEN...From this evening to Monday, June 26. * IMPACTS...At 4.3 feet, Lowland flooding below Mackay Dam through the Darlington Flats. US Highway 93 may be impacted at the curve by Leslie between 3900 North and 4050 North. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:45 PM MDT Sunday the stage was 3.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to 4.5 feet just after midnight tonight. - Flood stage is 4.3 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 4.4 feet on 06/28/2010. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (6 pm MDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Mon Tue Wed Big Lost River Mackay Reservoi 4.3 3.9 Sun 6 pm MDT 4.5 4.5 4.5 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
